Body: Description: Need to see how long and where to set the data retaining and had how to access the archive data
Steps to Reproduce Updated: Under the Netwrix Auditor Dashboard, click Settings and navigate to the Audit Database, Long-Term Archive, and Investigations tabs on the left pane
What We've Learned Updated: Customer needs instructions/guidance to specific locations within Netwrix Auditor to view/modify Data Retention and accessing Archive data
Next Steps Updated: Sent out first-response email to customer detailing instructions and linking kb articles.

Contacted customer with screenshots for Netwrix Auditor's data retention and archive settings. Customer came back with their own screenshot of Netwrix Enterprise Auditor. Switching ticket to Enterprise Auditor Queue.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Frantz Baptiste, Glenda Coley
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed

Steps to Reproduce Updated: In NEA, if you Expend the File System and Expand FSAC System Scan, Expand Configure, and click Queries.
Click Query Properties and click Configure, you will see the Retention under the Scan Filters.
